basic.blooming: Flowering period June-August, fruiting period July-September
basic.color: Flower color orange red, with scattered purple brown dots, fruit color yellow green

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, may grow in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.fertilization: Apply fertilizers monthly in vegetative stages
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
